column2: We are currently in search of Co-Ordinators with minimum of 2 years of experience to join our Project Management Team    Responsibilities and Duties      Schedule and track progress of tasks for assigned artists or sequences in the production system.          Track and maintain database of revisions, omits, and shot length changes; notifies the affected crew as needed.          Partner with other production personnel to ensure shots are scheduled and delivered in a timely manner.          Follow up with artists on a daily basis to ensure task deliveries remain on schedule, communicating any scheduling changes to the appropriate Artists, Heads of Department and Production team as needed.          Coordinate all client deliveries, both physical deliveries and digital deliveries via approved Client designated system.          Maintain log of all deliveries and manages meeting schedule and rounds with HODs, taking and publishing notes for the team.          Set up dailies and all client review sessions.      Qualifications      Minimum 2 years experience in VFX production or feature animation.          BA or BS degree in film, art, communications, or related field (preferred).          Good knowledge of Office tools such as MS Excel.          Experience with some production tracking software and asset management software, preferably Shotgun will be a plus.          Schedule management experience in an extremely time-sensitive atmosphere, preferably in highly technical, dynamic departments.          Must possess a high level of written, verbal, negotiation, decision making and analytical skills.          Must possess highly developed communication skills to facilitate interdepartmental needs and schedules required, exhibiting a consistent standard of excellence in all business communications.
column11: Analytical skills, Publishing, Excel, Project management, Production Coordinator, Animation, Scheduling, Database maintenance, Asset management, Management

column2: What you??l do:       The Production Lead is a creative problem-solver, who will collaborate, motivate, and lead 3d & Video projects throughout the various stages of the project life cycle including technical discovery, creative development, and production. This role requires ?responsibility for overall stakeholder management and supervising day to day project activities, ensuring delivery quality and deadlines are maintained. The Production Lead should be process-oriented and should efficiently manage long-term and short-term staffing and scheduling. Should pocess a strong Project Management skills.?? ?   "Scheduling - Scheduled projects, and created detailed timelines to maximize team and vendor efficiency throughout the project phase. Day-to-Day Production - Managing the day to day 3d and Video production activities in an efficient and professional manner and ensuring all team targets are met as planned Prioritize - Understand stakeholder priorities; partner with Vendor Coordinator & Production Team ?to identify potential solutions to meet their needs; able to guide scope and timeline discussions. Draft Estimate - Draft project estimates and detailed scope definitions in partnership with Vendor Coordinator & Production Team. Track & Report - Track and present detailed schedules, milestone objectives, status reports, and other documentation clearly and accurately. Drive Team Meetings - Drive weekly project team meetings and daily SCRUMS and ensure Visual Control sheets are up-to-date. Collaborate - Develop collaborative and positive relationships with Vendor Coordinator, Production Team and Stakeholders; motivate project teams to excel, while supporting their various work streams to ensure adherence to objectives, processes, and timelines. Divergent Solution - Proactively identify opportunities to adapt and/or streamline processes for efficiency and suggests alternative solutions when required due to timeline or budget constraints. Identify Risk - Identify and communicate potential risk and collaborate with the Vendor Coordinator & Production Team to reach a viable solution. Maintain a flexible approach towards the delegated tasks. Identify Issues - Identify production issues and work to develop solutions with Vendor Coordinator & Production Team. Consultant - Act as the consultant in various project meetings to gather information & vet out potential opportunities & involvement. Juggle multiple projects - Able to juggle multiple projects simultaneously; acts and carries out duties with a sense of urgency as needed Timely Communication - Ensure timely and accurate documentation of client communications and feedback to the internal team. OPEX - Responsible for the OPEX score card metrics/measurement.            Qualifications:       Graduate/post-graduate; preferably in Art/ Communications            Skills:       "Minimum 10+ years of Creative Project Management experience Client-facing experience or creative agency experience required; both preferred. PMP Certification (Added advantage) Experience with creative development processes and needs across several media, 3d interactive/digital and video to manage and deliver work.Technical Know-how of MS Office Suit, 3D Studio Max, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Photoshop "??Able to articulate technical and creative concepts and requirements to a variety of audiences ??Proficient in flexible & adaptive project planning methodologies ??Passion for creative work and improving processes to build efficient workflows ??Creative problem-solver; offers alternatives when needed for process, resource, time, and/or technology constraints. ??Solid presentation skills and experience successfully pitching new ideas; Strong ability to influence with excellent written & oral communication skills."

column1: Animation Studio Manager - Work From Home
column2: We are on the lookout for an exceptional Manager to lead our talented animation team and oversee the entire production pipeline. Job Description:  You will be responsible for managing and coordinating every aspect of our production pipeline, from storyboarding and concept art to animation and final delivery. Key Responsibilities: Storyboarding and Creative Direction:  Collaborate with our creative team to develop captivating storylines and visuals that align with our anime-style storytelling. Production Oversight:  Manage and monitor the entire production process, ensuring timelines and quality standards are met at every stage. Distribution and Delivery:  Coordinate the distribution and delivery of completed projects to our platforms. Qualifications: Proven experience in animation production, with a deep understanding of anime-style storytelling. Strong leadership and team management skills. Proficiency in animation software and industry-standard tools. Creative vision and a passion for storytelling. Exceptional communication and problem-solving skills. If you are a passionate and experienced professional looking to lead a dynamic team in the world of anime-style animation, we'd love to hear from you.
column11: Leadership, Pipeline Development, Cinematic Storytelling, Team Management, Storyboarding, Character Design, Art Direction, Problem Solving, Rigging, Animation Principles, Project Management, Visual Storytelling, Communication

column2: PROJECT   COORDINATOR Job Title  Intern- Project Coordinator Department  Production Location  Bhubaneswar Job Description ??Understand clear and complete project instructions and prepare files for translation and assign projects to resources ??Ensure all projects are delivered on time with expected quality and Zero defects ??Monitor project progress and handle any issues that arise ??Review files before delivery to the client with zero defect ??Timely updating client SOPs ??Timely updating on Business automation system with all relevant information and necessary documentation of all projects ??Coordination with internal and external stakeholders to establish cordial/effective working relationship ??Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, plans and reports ??Ensure adherence to ISO processes ??Strictly follow Companys Data Privacy policies Qualifications and Requirements ??MBA fresher ??Knowledge of MS Office as well as Translation and Localization software (such as CAT tools and Translation Management System software) ??Knowledge of practices and tools, including the effective use of project management software ??Planning and organizing skills ??Flexibility and ability to work on tight deadlines ??Problem solving skills ??Team Player ??Good Oral and written communication skills

Reporting to the Head of Studio, the Post Supervisor leads our growing team of Editors charged with creating high volume premium long-form Original and Clip based content for our FAST channel/OTT/CTV Business.                      The Post Supervisor will      manage and mentor the entire social post-production team of Senior, Mid-Level and Junior Editors.                     You will be the steward of our post workflow operations from edit start through QC and deliverables for multiple social media platforms. The Post Supervisor will work in close conjunction with the Programming and Production Teams, to ensure effective and timely delivery of all socials content. In addition, the Post Supervisor will also assist with the hiring and onboarding of any new staff and freelancers.                      The Post Supervisor is an operational leader and video expert with excellent technical skills, a strong creative flair, and a deep understanding of short- and long-form video content production.                          You will be comfortable both giving and receiving creative feedback and ensuring the team is addressing notes in a timely manner.                          Organized with the ability to multitask effectively, you re eager to be part of a growing, award-winning video team.                          About you:                              Dynamic and assertive, you are a strong leader who can guide your team toward a future ripe with possibilities     You foster a culture in which delivering creative excellence, experimentation and innovation are the norm     A person who leads by example, you inspire and delight your colleagues with your bold yet strategically and fiscally sound creativity     You encourage an environment in which ideas are eagerly shared, and support and mentoring are in the team s DNA       Deeply curious, you re a watcher, reader and consumer of content, enabling you to spot opportunities through your own creative endeavors     You re obsessed    with your craft, staying abreast of video and digital entertainment trends and applying your skills to the creation of dynamic, engaging social and OTT video experiences     You re dedicated to bringing brand positioning and voice to life in your own and your team s production work and understand the inherent connection between compelling content and building deeper audience relationships                                                  Your day-to-day:                                    Effectively manage and own all Digital Studio post-production timelines                      Own post-production schedules for all videos and distribute work efficiently among staff and freelance editors                    Manage and mentor the team across all projects, ensure all new hires are onboarded to follow the systems and protocols, and are set up for success                  Manage guidelines for freelance editors, ensuring they have access to the proper equipment, drives, websites, resources and plugins to perform their duties                    Maintain and build upon our team of go-to freelance editors and vendors. Recruit and manage freelance editors, sound mixers, colorists, and VFX artists as needed                      Assist the editors with any, and all technical troubleshooting                      Responsible for day-to-day quality control of all finished assets                    Work with IT to ensure archiving of server, infrastructure needs are met, and remote workflow systems are operational                    Own post-production workflow on Airtable and ensure the editing team are updating their projects status as required                    Maintain master naming guidelines, content assets, protocols and practices                    Research, create and implement new methods to optimize efficiency of the post team, and develop workflows to improve collaboration between the India and US Teams                      Other duties as assigned by the Head of Studio, and VP/Creative                          Requirements:                          Minimum of 8+ Years in Post-Production, with at least 5 Years in a coordinating and/or supervisory role in a production environment (      digital, production, broadcast, post)                      Extensive knowledge of production processes, equipment, and software used in video production and editing.      Of sound technical know-how                      Extensive roster of editors, colorists, and VFX artists                      Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, with emphasis on Premiere and After Effects, coupled with experience in DaVinci and color grading                      Deep knowledge of and experience creating and delivering high-performing content for FAST channel/OTT/Social media platforms                      Adaptability to exploring with automation AI tools                      Understands social media trends and analytics                      Mastery of the English language and a familiarity of English used in U.S. digital media                      Exceptional attention to detail and strong organizational skills                      Solid leadership skills with the ability to communicate strategy and objectives clearly                      A disposition for high-growth, entrepreneurial culture that requires teamwork and significant interaction with employees at all levels
column11: Health insurance, Automation, Social media, Manager Quality Control, Troubleshooting, Licensing, Operations, Analytics

column1: Dairy Technology-Executive Level  @ Manor Unit Heritage Foods Ltd.
column2: Dear Aspirant, Greetings From Heritage Foods Ltd !! We have an opening for the position of Dairy Technology - Production Executive at Manor Packing Station. Interested candidates can forward their resumes to  Mail: mnr.admin@heritagefoods.in / Whatsapp @ 7075453459/ (Sujit Pawar - HR).     KEY RESULT AREAS: 1. Monitoring of Process & Produce Quality of Milk & Milk Products. 2. Effective utilization of Manpower & Energy. 3. Maintain Safety, Cleanliness and Hygiene Conditions. 4. Implementation of SOPs and documentation as per ISO Norms. 5. Adherence of CCPs, Minimization of Operational losses & leakages. 6. Monitoring Quality Packing, Storage & Preservation of Produced Products on time. 7. Monitoring Consumption of Consumables & Packing Materials. 8. Enhance Skills levels of Team members by organizing Intensive Training. 9. Regular updation of Production Module in ERP and Generate reports.   PRE-REQUISITES FOR HR & ADMIN: Work Location: Heritage Foods Limited, Manor Unit, NH-48, Beside Silver Resort, Manor, Palghar Tal ET Dist, Maharashtra - 401403. Designation:  Executive / Sr. Executive Leval Gross Salary: 20,000/-Pm to 40,000/-Pm Extra Benefits: Yearly Bonus Separate, PF, Bonus, Gratuity, Variable Pay, Insurance facilities (GMA, GPA, GTLI). Qualification: B.Tech in Dairy Technology / Food Technology or Relevant Qualification. Experience Required: 02 Years to 10 Years Good Knowledge of MS Office,  Preferable for only Male Candidates. Should know the local language (Marathi). Preferred shall be given to those who are willing to work at any location.

column2: As a Multimedia Production Intern, you will be an integral part of our creative team, contributing to the development of engaging and visually compelling multimedia content     This internship provides a unique opportunity to enhance your skills in animation, video editing, and advanced editing software, working with industry-standard tools like Adobe After Effects and Adobe Animate     You will collaborate with experienced professionals in a dynamic environment, gaining hands-on experience in multimedia production             Responsibilities         Animation and Video Editing:         Create visually appealing animations using Adobe After Effects and Adobe Animate.     Edit and enhance video content to meet project requirements.     Collaborate with the team to bring creative concepts to life through multimedia.         Multimedia Content Development:         Contribute to the planning and execution of multimedia projects.     Work on various aspects of content creation, including graphics, visual effects, and animations.         Tool Proficiency:         Develop a deep understanding of advanced editing software and multimedia tools.     Stay updated on the latest industry trends and software updates.         Collaboration:         Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with project goals.     Communicate effectively to understand and implement creative briefs.         Quality Assurance:         Review and refine multimedia content to ensure high-quality standards are met.     Provide constructive feedback during the review process.         Qualifications         Proficiency in using Adobe After Effects, Adobe Animate, and other advanced editing software.     Strong creative and artistic abilities with an eye for detail.     Knowledge of multimedia production techniques and trends.     Effective communication and collaboration skills.     Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.     Proactive and self-motivated with a strong desire to learn and grow in the multimedia production field
